Nazi Policies Toward Jews and Minorities

abstract.p: Stephen Sayre Singer letter on June 21 article deplores efforts in Germany to find some justifications for Nazi genocide

block.p: Re ''Hitler Apologist Wins German Honor, and a Storm Breaks Out'' (news article, June 21):

There is, even as generations pass away, a hole in Germany's heart, created by the Nazi regime. A continuing healing process is not aided by the conjuring of spurious justifications for a genocidal program.
Re ''Hitler Apologist Wins German Honor, and a Storm Breaks Out'' (news article, June 21):

There is, even as generations pass away, a hole in Germany's heart, created by the Nazi regime. A continuing healing process is not aided by the conjuring of spurious justifications for a genocidal program.

For those who emphasize a distinctive German culture and civilization and who oppose tendencies toward multicultural homogenization, the need to acknowledge this singular horror is especially essential. Without such honesty, both reconciliation and healthy cultural development are forever shadowed.
STEPHEN SAYRE SINGER New York, June 22, 2000
